author: Chad Holloway
comment: This is a neat app and works well with my Moto 360 Sport. I would like to have an option of changing the color of the hour and minute hands instead of only the second hand. Maybe this can be addressed in a future update.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Will look into this, thanks for the feedback.

title: No Complaints

author: Renato Di Ciano
comment: Dear developer please give me your email to send you the correct flag for Venezuela. Currently it has the Chinese flag although they own us we still have our own flag LMAO

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: its at the bottom of the page were you can download the app from.

title: Nice app some flags are wrong

author: Steve Evans
comment: Great little watch face app. The Welsh flag is wrong. It shows the flag of the UK. Please fix before next round of Euro 2016 😃

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Please email me the wiki flag link so I may update it.

title: Great little app but Wrong flag

author: Darya Suvorova
comment: Wrong flags for some countries like Uzbekistan. Also Colorado is not a country, it's a state. Are there supposed to be other states on the list?

author: Christopher May
comment: This app does what or says and looks good doing it. Download, set it on your watch, then change the country and style in the android wear settings. Easy. One request; the flag for Scotland is weathered green in the upper left hand side. The Scottish flag has an all blue background and while I know this was done for an artistic grunge style, it doesn't really read true. Keeping it all blue (and grungy) would make this Scotsman happy! Love the app!

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback, I will be doing a major re-haul of the app over Xmas period, hopefully bring the resolution up to scratch on the higher res watch faces, this means redoing all the flags.  Hope you can wait till then.  Thanks for the feedback.

title: Looks and Works Great!

author: Wewill Chen
comment: There is no app icon on my phone,there is no way to change the flag.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: You change the flags in the Android Wear app, settings are only available in the Wear App.  Select the Wear, and you will see a cogwheel in the centre of the icon for the watchface, tap on that to enter settings on the phone/tablet.

title: I don't know how to change the flag

author: Philip Israel
comment: Be perfect if we had the choice to have 12 hour or 24 hour setting!! HTC M9
title: 12hour

author: Yalin Meric
comment: It will be a perfect watch face if it offers a monochrome or colored flag for dimmed mode. My watch can handle colored watch faces in dimmed mode for a day.
title: It will be a perfect watch face if...

author: Gio
comment: I really like this app but would recommend the developer to make the background truly black to save battery in Oled displays

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: This is controlled by the watch OS itself, I looked into this and there is no way to do what you say in regards in the watch face code, this is how the watch OS works, sorry I tried.

title: Original but needs optim for Oled displays

author: john mccall
comment: Does not work with Asus Zenwatch. I have one watch face only.  The union jack.  No others.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: You need to access the watch face via the Android Wear App, please read the description it does state there are no settings available on the watch itself.  (if it does not appear but shows in the Wear App, uninstall and then reinstall, it can take several minutes to show within the Wear App.

title: Poor program8

author: Enzo Enzo
comment: Im gonna give you one star because 20 days ago some of your customers told you for some countries missing,and you didn't do nothing to fix it. It is strange that you have Quebec,Texas and Tibet flag,but no Croatia,Jamaica,Samoa or Serbia there,very strange from Greek developer.

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content:
If a flag request is not rec'd via email then it will not be put into the watch face.
It takes well over 20+ hours to update code and test before each upload, so flags updates are every 2-3 months. Or if I get enough new flag emails.
Please email the developer with the wiki flag link and it will be added in the next update.

author: A Bennion
comment: Love the look, but I would like it better, give 5 stars if the date could stay on instead of the battery.

comment: Although has same mistakes with flags but is nice to have this app :)

reply.author: YellaDev
reply.content: Please email the flags and the mistakes made please, so they can be rectified, please note some counties have several flags, and some have been added as requests for that country.
